name: H2BS SPV0 PublicTest V1-3
description:
Welcome to the racing game.

Please at least watch the demo video to have a firm grasp what this game about before playing.

Help me with your feedback on Google Form, it will let me know how to improve the game further in the future.

This project is in development and for school assignment.

https://forms.gle/ooRcqzHazyYTrjWx9

Game currently have these features:

  • Customise type of race that player want to participates (Level Selection) (Racing, Time Attack) (Opponent Count) (Level Laps) (Time Limit)
  • Sandbox level allow player to test vehicle technical parameters in many test situations.
  • 3 Cars to choose with different parameters.
  • 2 levels to play (1 Sprint A to B level and 1 Circuit Loop).
  • Dummy AIs that will try to finish the race (but will get stuck at middle of nowhere sometimes). sad :^(
  • (Safeguard feature) If the car gets stuck, waits too long at the same location or flying off somewhere, the game forces that car to return to the last checkpoint it had reach.

The game has debug features:

  • Integrated SRDebugger inside the game - Activate this feature by left click three times on the top left corner screen in the game window.
  • (Only use to see PC SPECIFICATIONS, CPU and RAM usage).

Controller Type: KEYBOARD + MOUSE ONLY, no support for gamepad

Key Controls:

  • W or Up Arrow - Accelerate the car
  • A/D or Left/Right Arrow - Steer car left and right
  • S or Down Arrow - Reverse the car
  • N - Boost the car speed
  • C - Change the car camera position
  • ESC or P - Pause Game
